content: I'm not sure about finding a walking buddy just yet. I kind of enjoy the alone time while walking, and it gives me a chance to clear my head. But I do appreciate the suggestion! Speaking of alone time, I've been using my new wireless blood pressure monitor from Omron to track my blood pressure regularly. It's been interesting to see the fluctuations, and my doctor recommended I keep an eye on it since my last check-up showed slightly higher than normal readings.
